title: Honoring Steve Carpaneto upon the occasion of his designation for special recognition by Team New York Rotary
fulltext:
LEGISLATIVE RESOLUTION honoring Steve Carpaneto upon the occasion of his
designation for special recognition by Team New York Rotary

WHEREAS,  It is the sense of this Legislative Body to recognize that the
quality and character of life in the communities across New  York  State
are  reflective of the concerned and dedicated efforts of those individ-
uals who would devote themselves to the welfare of the community and its
citizenry; and
  WHEREAS, Attendant to such concern, and in full accord with its  long-
standing  traditions,  this  Legislative  Body  is justly proud to honor
Steve Carpaneto upon the occasion of his designation for special  recog-
nition by Team New York Rotary; and
  WHEREAS,  Carey  Counselor  Steve  Carpaneto  ran in the New York City
Marathon along with Team New York Rotary on November 7, 2010,  in  order
to support four charities; and
  WHEREAS, These particular charities include: the Ronald McDonald House
NY,  Polio  Plus International, Gift of Life International, and New York
Rotary Foundation; and
  WHEREAS, Steve Carpaneto raised a significant amount for these partic-
ular causes through donations from his family, friends  and  colleagues;
and
  WHEREAS,  Although this was the first marathon Steve Carpaneto has run
in, he completed it in just over four hours; and
  WHEREAS, It is the sense of this Legislative Body that  when  individ-
uals  of  such  noble aims and accomplishments are brought to our atten-
tion, they should be celebrated and recognized by all  the  citizens  of
this great Empire State; now, therefore, be it
  RESOLVED,  That  this  Legislative  Body pause in its deliberations to
honor Steve Carpaneto upon the occasion of his designation  for  special
recognition by Team New York Rotary; and be it further
  RESOLVED, That a copy of this Resolution, suitably engrossed, be tran-
smitted to Steve Carpaneto.
